definitions.definition: To provide assistance to (someone or something).
definitions.example: He helped his grandfather cook breakfast.

definitions.definition: To assist (a person) in getting something, especially food or drink at table; used with to.
definitions.example: Help yourself to whatever's in the fridge.

definitions.definition: To contribute in some way to.
definitions.example: If you want to get a job, it helps to have some prior experience.

definitions.definition: To avoid; to prevent; to refrain from; to restrain (oneself). Usually used in nonassertive contexts with can.
definitions.example: Are they going to beat us? Not if I can help it!

definitions.definition: A portion or serving, especially of food that one takes for oneself, or to which one helps oneself.
definitions.example: She eagerly took a second helping of ice cream.
